object.name: editMessageChecklist
object.description: Use this method to edit a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the edited Message is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the edited Message is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the edited :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned.
